table.name: vtiger_listaccommodations
table.sql: CREATE TABLE `vtiger_listaccommodations` ( `listaccommodationsid` int(11) NOT NULL DEFAULT '0', `accommodation_name` VARCHAR(128) DEFAULT NULL, `code` VARCHAR(128) DEFAULT NULL, PRIMARY KEY (`listaccommodationsid`) ) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8

table.name: vtiger_listaccommodationscf
table.sql: CREATE TABLE `vtiger_listaccommodationscf` ( `listaccommodationsid` int(11) NOT NULL, PRIMARY KEY (`listaccommodationsid`) ) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8
